attributes.action: Look into Rationing Of Fuel. Pricing people of the road  is Discriminating and hits the low Paid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
producing Green House Gases is not the perogative of the Rich and privaledged.
That is what Government is proposing.
The proposed road pricing etc will only serve to remove the under privaledge from the roads  
Governmental and Local planning created the road problem. They should solve it or resign, . 
Why not Ration the Fuel we use . 
 


Fiddles a few may a be . But then governments do it on a grand scale by Carbon trading Billions tons of carbon.
  Give us a Fuel Ration Card unique to our vehicle only. No MOT. No Insurance. No Road Tax. Not your car  Pump will not deliver Fuel;And far cheaper to introduce that all those spy in the sky satellites for road pricing. 

It change our life styles
It would reduce car crime, it would release police for more essential duries, It would reduce green house gases and pollution

Please Sign this petition
Resolve the Lie of green Taxes

  David Cassie

rejection.details:
There are already a few petitions on this issue
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=fuel+rationing
Please consider signing an existing petition, rather than creating another
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
